name: Solar System (itch) (blucowindustries)
description:
This is my Solar System Project. I modified the project with the following changes/additions:

Added the following planets:

  • Mercury
  • Mars
  • Venus
  • Jupiter
  • Saturn (+ rings)
  • Uranus
  • Neptune (+ rings)
  • Also resized all planets and sun to be more realistic with scale

Added: 

  • A mini tree on top of Earth for fun
  • "My Solar System" free-floating text in the scene for fun

Modified both cameras in the following ways:

  • Altered main camera placement, angle, and distance
  • Added motion to main camera to give the scene more life
  • Increased minimap camera field of view to include the new planets
